question: 寿命
sourceMnemonic: Your <kanji>lifespan</kanji> is your <kanji>fate</kanji> and will show you how long your <vocabulary>lifespan</vocabulary> is.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You did learn the reading of <ja>寿</ja>, but the reading for <ja>命</ja> is an exception. When you think of a lifespan, think of how that affects everyone. Me, you... well, just those things. Combine them both into <reading>myou</reading> (<ja>みょう</ja>). That is who the lifespan affects. Myou!
